mapper.select:
SELECT '0' AS CHK , '' AS ROWFLAG , A.PRG_ID , A.PRG_NO , A.PRG_NAME , A.PRG_TYPE_CD , A.PJT_ID , A.BIZ_ID , D.BIZ_NAME , A.PLAN_SDATE , A.PLAN_EDATE , A.ACTL_SDATE , A.ACTL_EDATE , A.CHG_USER_NM , A.DEV_USER_ID , A.DEV_USER_NM , A.DEV_USER_DEPT , A.PL_USER_ID , A.PL_USER_NM , A.PL_USER_DEPT , A.REG_STIME , A.REG_USER_ID , A.REG_USER_NM , A.REG_USER_DEPT , A.LMOD_SDATE , A.LMOD_USER_ID , A.LMOD_USER_NM , A.LMOD_USER_DEPT , A.PRG_DESC , A.REMARK , B.PJT_NAME AS PJT_NAME , C.PJT_ID AS P_PJT_ID , C.PJT_NAME AS P_PJT_NAME , E.FUNC_NO_INFO , E.FUNC_NAME_INFO
FROM PJ_PROGRAM A , PJ_PROJECT B , PJ_PROJECT C , PJ_BIZ D , ( SELECT EE.PJT_ID , EE.PRG_ID , SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X, CHR(10), FF.FUNC_NO) ORDER BY FF.FUNC_NO, FF.FUNC_ID).EXTRACT('//text()').GETCLOBVAL(),2) AS FUNC_NO_INFO , SUBSTR(XMLAGG(XMLELEMENT(X, CHR(10), FF.FUNC_NAME) ORDER BY FF.FUNC_NO, FF.FUNC_ID).EXTRACT('//text()').GETCLOBVAL(),2) AS FUNC_NAME_INFO FROM PJ_PRG_FUNC_MAP EE , PJ_FUNCTION FF WHERE 1 = 1 AND EE.FUNC_ID = FF.FUNC_ID AND EE.PJT_ID = FF.PJT_ID AND EE.PJT_ID = #{SUB_PJT_ID}
GROUP BY EE.PJT_ID , EE.PRG_ID ) E WHERE 1 = 1 AND A.PJT_ID = B.PJT_ID AND B.PARENT_ID = C.PJT_ID AND A.PJT_ID = D.PJT_ID AND A.BIZ_ID = D.BIZ_ID AND A.PJT_ID = E.PJT_ID(+) AND A.PRG_ID = E.PRG_ID(+)
AND A.BIZ_ID = #{BIZ_ID}
AND UPPER(A.PRG_NO) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{PRG_NO}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.PRG_NAME) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{PRG_NM}) || '%'
AND A.PRG_TYPE_CD = #{PRG_TYPE_CD}
AND UPPER(A.CHG_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{CHG_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.DEV_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{DEV_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND UPPER(A.PL_USER_NM) LIKE '%' || UPPER(#{PL_USER_NM}) || '%'
AND A.PRG_ID IN ( SELECT AA.PRG_ID FROM PJ_PRG_FUNC_MAP AA , PJ_FUNCTION BB WHERE 1 = 1 AND AA.PJT_ID = BB.PJT_ID AND AA.FUNC_ID = BB.FUNC_ID AND AA.PJT_ID = #{SUB_PJT_ID} AND UPPER(BB.FUNC_NO) LIKE UPPER('%' || #{FUNC_NO} || '%') )
AND ( A.PLAN_SDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} OR A.PLAN_EDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} )
AND ( A.ACTL_SDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} OR A.ACTL_EDATE BETWEEN #{SDATE} AND #{EDATE} )
ORDER BY A.PRG_NO, A.PRG_ID
mapper.delete: DELETE FROM PJ_PRG_FUNC_MAP WHERE 1 = 1 AND PRG_ID = #{PRG_ID}
DELETE FROM PJ_PROGRAM WHERE 1 = 1 AND PRG_ID = #{PRG_ID}
